nodes.text: The Raid on the Jedi Temple was a mission that the bounty hunter Cad Bane undertook during the Clone Wars to steal a Jedi holocron from the Jedi Temple's Holocron Vault. He did so, aided by the Clawdite Cato Parasitti and the Techno-service droid Todo 360. Despite the fact the Jedi Temple had been infiltrated, the Jedi, in their arrogance, barely upgraded their security, later allowing Separatist Captain Rackham Sear to bomb the Jedi Temple.
